GEN_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Fetches game files for the specified Steam AppID.
GEN_APPID_DESCRIPTION: The Steam AppID of the game.
SUCCESS_ATTACHED_DESCRIPTION: **{gameName}** files have been zipped. Your download will be sent privately.
UPLOADING_DESCRIPTION: ZIP file is {size} MB, too large for direct attachment. Uploading to file host...
UPLOAD_COMPLETE_DESCRIPTION: Upload complete! Click the button below to download.
FILES_NOT_FOUND: Files for this game are not available yet.
REQUEST_GAME_TOOLTIP: Request this game to be added to the database
REQUEST_UPDATE_TOOLTIP: Request an update for this game
REQUEST_SUBMITTED: Your request for this game has been submitted! You will be notified when the game is available.
UPDATE_REQUEST_SUBMITTED: Your update request has been submitted! You will be notified when the game files are updated.
REQUEST_ERROR: Failed to submit your request. Please try again later.
ERROR_GENERIC: An error occurred. Please try again later.
BULK_DOWNLOAD_UPLOADING: ZIP file is {size} MB, uploading to file host...
COOLDOWN_MESSAGE: ⏳ You're on cooldown — please try again in a few seconds.
SUCCESS_ATTACHED_DESCRIPTION: ✅ All done! Here's your archive. Usage stats below.
UPLOAD_COMPLETE_DESCRIPTION: ✅ Upload finished! Download link and usage stats below.
